website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and stylish, enhances indoor and outdoor design schemes.
pros: As great as it looks, it's durable,  too, with reports it can support up to 300 lb
We love that this beanbag comes in different colors to accent your personal design aesthetic
Comfortable and functions well for those who want to relax
cons: Lacks a print on one side

website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option with a laid-back feel that works just as well indoors as it does outdoors.
pros: Lightweight and easy to move from the living room to the patio and back again
Large enough to work as additional seating and just the right height to put your feet up
Weather-resistant cover can be removed for washing
Comes in a variety of fun colors
cons: Prone to losing height and shape after a while, especially when used as a seat

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but flattens FAST..
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast.... looks fantastic in my living room & comfy, but very disappointed that they are already flattening out less than 1 month of use. Bought 2 on April 3rd, and both need to be re-filled.
customer_reviews.author: Mt reader

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to use in our RV. We wanted a place to stretch our legs while sitting on the sofa so lightweight was important to us. The height of the pouf is perfect; some advertised were not as tall. I feel the value and quality is excellent. As you can see, they've not made it to the RV as yet, and we may need to get another for our home. It's definitely been approved by us and our cat, Mona!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ferri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Black & white links pattern. The material is a coated twill - feels a bit plasticky but that is perfect for outdoors but also indoors if you share a home with a cat that likes to scratch (like mine). I've had this about a month and she is not interested in shredding it. We are using this as an ottoman so the fill is perfect. It's supportive but has some give. Feels stiff enough to use as a stool but I'm not sure if it would hold up as long if used as a stool.
customer_reviews.author: KimP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, perfect match, solved a problem. Our pontoon boat has two captains chairs. As co-captain, I wanted to be able to put my feet up. Needed to be indoor/outdoor durable. This is perfect. I’d like to get a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pop of poof
customer_reviews.text: I love this little poof. The yellow is a slight mustard color which suited my need to match my canvas prints. The yellow was $42.67 , an ok deal, but I wouldn't want to pay any more than that honestly. Arrived a day sooner than expected! Seems nice and firm. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: gethunter

customer_reviews.title: forgot it was really a bean bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pouf for my daughter's dorm room. I was hoping it would stay more in the cube form but not long after use it was more in a bean bag form. They still use it but I was hoping it would stay in cube for for sitting on or foot stool. Still serves it's purpose. Needed to spend alot more to get a more sturdy cube next time I guess.
customer_reviews.author: dena

customer_reviews.title: Nice and multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are nice outdoor ottomans. They have great coloring and the size is decent. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-babe

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for house warming gift. My friend loved them. Very comfortable. Perfect for patio. Love the vibrant red color and pattern
customer_reviews.author: Suzi R

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for outside to use with a small table and chair set. It is so ugly!!! Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This weather resistant pouf is perfect for our screened in porch
customer_reviews.text: This weather resistant pouf is perfect for our screened in porch. It is bright and colorful. Cheerful addition to our porch furniture. Highly recommend this porduct.
customer_reviews.author: Dialane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable foot stool. Conforms to your feet and relieves pressure points. Quality material and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: LucyDog

customer_reviews.title: I love this, it's very functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it's very functional. I use it as an otoman, and pop a tray on it and you have a little table. It's very comfortable as an otoman.
customer_reviews.author: heslinjanet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accent piece!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color. Looks good in my living room. I use it for a foot stool which serves its purpose. I was surprised how light it is.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Tam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I’ve bought 4. We use on porch, deck, pontoon boat.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Pouf! It looks amazing & has kept it's shape. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cim OHanlon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for resting my feet while I sit outside!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Remotigue

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I had hoped but it’s a place to sit
customer_reviews.author: R. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Nice foot “stool”
customer_reviews.text: Great foot “stool” for lake house. Exactly what I was looking for. Lightweight. Attractive. Comfortable as a food stool and sturdy enough to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a foot rest or additional seating on the porch or inside.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to use on my back porch as a foot rest or extra seat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kisella

customer_reviews.title: Scotch guard it before use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me to put my feet up when we’re watching T.V. Outdoors, I just scotch guarded it and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Blake

customer_reviews.title: Is holding up great outside on my patio.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my patio for a foot rest. It's lightweight and handsome. I've had it a month and the color is vibrant. It dries quickly and doesn't retain water after a rain.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cube
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my newly renovated bedroom that is all in black, white, grey and yellow! This fits perfectly and is functional as well to be used as either a SEAT or a foot rest! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: VNorton

customer_reviews.title: Indoor outdoor flexible seating option
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and exactly what the person was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Love the color, love the size, and seem to be holding up very well with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo. And great price for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra seating
customer_reviews.text: Great size and comfortable as footrest. Sturdy fabric and great colors. After being rained on it repelled the water and dried quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. We use they outside and they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Removable cover makes it easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect addition for small patios. It could also double as a seat for guest.
customer_reviews.author: Shakira Bouy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed and well made. I have a similar one that I got elsewhere and it is very flimsy. Use on my enclosed patio after a long day on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Carolann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this cube looked so cute in the photo, then when I got it I realized how light weight it was and contacted seller to return it. They said only if it's not open, plus they would charge a restocking fee, plus I would have to pay for shipping! After all of that I decided it's not worth it and should keep it. Had it maybe a month, now it's loosing shape, and nobody even sits on it, nor do I put anything on it! It does blow off my patio on a regular basis, so maybe that's the problem:( I will never buy from this company again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We is them indoors. Pop of color for the room and your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great quality. Bought two and have them on my balcony with a couch and fire pit. They work great as either a seat or a foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect and looks great - she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got his for my mom to put on her balcony to elevate her legs. Its perfect and looks great - she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Filling settles too much. Not full enough. Love the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice quality fabric, great ottoman height and supportive enough to sit on
customer_reviews.author: ValerieAM

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It has held up well over torrential ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has held up well over torrential downpour and is a great accent piece for my patio
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Fry

customer_reviews.title: It's like a dark mustard color
customer_reviews.text: It's not yellow!! It's like a dark mustard color. Almost orange.
customer_reviews.author: TinaM93

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as pictured, but the quality of fabric and stuffing is very low. I would expect to pay $15-$20 for this at a store like IKEA. It is extremely light and is not comfortable for an adult to sit on. Looks nice and arrived as pictured, but very much over priced.
customer_reviews.author: grace

product_meta.title: Majestic Home Goods Links Indoor/Outdoor Bean Bag Ottoman Pouf Cube, 17" x 17" x 17" (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAdd style and color to your living room or outdoor seating arrangement with Majestic Home Goods Black Links Small Cube Ottoman. This cube is perfect for use as a footstool, side table or as extra seating for guests. Woven from outdoor treated polyester, these cubes have up to 1000 hours of U.V. protection and are able to withstand all of nature’s elements. The Ottoman Pouf Cube feature a zippered slipcover. Spot clean slipcover with mild detergent and hang dry. Do not wash insert.

SMALL CUBE OTTOMAN BY MAJESTIC HOME GOODS
 * For indoor and outdoor use
 * Functions as a chair, footstool, or side table
 * Zippered slipcover for easy removal
 * Spot clean with mild detergent, hang dry
 * Inserts using up to 50% recycled polystyrene beads
 * Woven from durable Outdoor Treated polyester with up to 1000 hours of U.V. protection
 * Replacement covers available for purchase
 * Dimensions: 17" L x 17" W x 17" H
feature_bullets: Dimensions - Approx. 17 in. x 17 in. x 17 in. Perfect convenient size for all indoor and outdoor environments

Removable Zippered Slipcover - Easily remove and clean your ottoman pouf cube cover after long and extended days of use or to remove dirt / stains. Machine Washable Cover. Do not wash the bean inserts

U.V. Treated Cover / Water Resistant Base - These bean bag ottoman pouf cube uses an outdoor treated polyester slipcover that offers up to 1000 hours of protection with 300/600 Water Resistant Denier Base
Recycled Polystyrene Beads - Filled with environmentally friendly, highly durable and comfortable polystyrene beads for long hours of sitting
Highest Quality and Durability - the bean bag ottoman pouf cube is made from special and highest quality polyester to reduce wear and tear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine wash and hang dry or dry clean
